channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Voilà comment bien commencer l’année en 4K QD-OLED à 240 Hz avec l’Asus Rog Swift qui perd 500 € de son prix
item.description: L’Asus ROG Swift PG32UCDM, c’est un écran OLED de 31,5 pouces qui pousse le vice jusqu’à 240 Hz. C'est un peu une frappe visuelle qui redéfinit la manière de jouer sur PC. Et comme si ça ne suffisait pas, son prix lâche la pression : de 1 399 € à 889 € sur Son-Vidéo.com.

item.title: 4 Best Smart Scales (2026), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: If you’re ready to start tracking your weight, BMI, and other health data on your phone, we’ve weighed in on some great options.

item.title: A fresh Samsung Galaxy S26 leak points to a launch date — and brings good news on pricing
item.description: While the Galaxy S26 phones might be launching later in the year, it sounds as though they won't cost any more.

item.title: Aides auto 2026 : bonus, leasing, CEE… voici tout ce qui change pour votre budget depuis le 1er janvier
item.description: L'argent magique, c'est fini. En ce 1er janvier 2026, les règles du jeu pour acheter une voiture électrique changent radicalement. Le score environnemental fait toujours le tri, mais les montants fondent et les conditions se durcissent. On fait le point pour vous éviter de perdre 1 000 ou 2 000 euros bêtement.

item.title: 14 Best Fitness Trackers (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Whether you’re skiing in the backcountry or trampolining in the backyard, we have an activity tracker for you.

item.title: How to Start (and Keep) a Healthy Habit (2026)
item.description: Whether you want to run a marathon or learn to play the guitar, here’s how to set yourself up for success.

item.title: How to watch The Traitors UK season 4 — free streams from anywhere
item.description: Claudia Winkleman and her lavish wardrobe return to Ardross Castle for a new 12-episode civial series. Here's how to watch The Traitors UK season 4 online.

item.title: Is 8GB of RAM enough for a laptop in 2026?
item.description: RAMageddon in 2026? There are dire predictions for laptops regarding the memory crisis, and we could see a lot more 8GB notebooks.

item.title: How to watch The Night Manager season 2 — stream long-awaited return of spy thriller for free
item.description: A chance encounter pulls Tom Hiddleston's MI6 agent back into action. Here's how to watch The Night Manager season 2 online and from anywhere.

item.title: Mega Currys New Year sale is live – I've picked the top 19 deals on TVs, laptops, appliances, and more
item.description: The Currys New Year sale is live, so I've picked out 19 of the best deals on TVs, appliances, laptops, and more top tech.

item.title: I got these tiny snore-masking buds hoping for better sleep, but now I wear them for walking and yoga too
item.description: The Soundcore Sleep A30 are built to help you sleep better, but the reason I’ve come to rely on them has nothing to do with bedtime.

item.title: AI Labor Is Boring. AI Lust Is Big Business
item.description: After years of hype about generative AI increasing productivity and making lives easier, 2025 was the year erotic chatbots defined AI’s narrative.

item.title: My one tech splurge in 2026 will be these 3 unsung TV streaming services – here's why
item.description: I'm treating myself to some new streaming service subscriptions this year – here are the three I'm starting with in 2026.

item.title: Forget New Year’s resolutions: Psychology reveals how to rewire your brain for success in 2026
item.description: Research shows most January goals don’t stick—but being more intention-based about getting a new job or hitting the gym can help. January is a time when many people reflect on their goals for the year ahead—a new job, a promotion, hitting the gym, or overall better health—but research from Baylor College of Medicine and psychologist Richard Wiseman shows 88% of people actually fail to achieve their New Year’s resolutions....

item.title: On a imprimé l’iPhone Fold en 3D pour le prendre en main et générer ce rendu : le format est très plaisant
item.description: Pour prendre en main l'iPhone Fold et se faire une première idée de son format original, nous l'avons imprimé en 3D. Cela nous a aussi permis de générer le rendu ci-dessous.
